Text: This game has a huge bug!! I get the blue screen memory dump & then crash, PC will only keep going for several minutes before the same thing happens again. I don't care if this uploader has a skull or not, protect your PC, don't download this torrent. I now have to format my drive. (Note: the bug is in the mountable file, not the additional folders, a scan may come up clean until you launch the .exe, then the PC will crash)
OMG thanks a 20 year old game I remember playing this in the early 90s wow how about Silent Service 2 when you get a chance?

OMG! The hours I spent learning this and flying the Falcon. I had Thrustmaster Joystick and matching Throttle stick too! Springs inside them used to POP and bust and Thrustmaster would always replace them free of charge. Oh, the good old days!
Cerebral222, get a real computer dude.
